title: Astar Learning Course
intro: This course is designed to learn about Astar Network.
content:
About Astar Network

  • Astar Network is a Public Blockchain from Japan

  • Multichain Smart Contract Platform

Currently, there are many independent Layer 1 Blockchains such as Etheruem and Bitcoin, which have created an intranet situation in the Internet, making interconnection difficult.

Example:) A process on chain A triggers a process on chain B to be executed.

Astar Network is a blockchain that connects multiple layer 1 blockchains in the Multichain era and aims to be a platform on which applications can be created.

Astar Network Features

  • Multichain Application

  • XVM

  • dapp staking

XVM is particularly significant, as it allows smart contracts to be deployed in both EVM and WebAssembly environments, enabling ecosystems that would otherwise be divided to work interactively.

This is also good because WebAssembly-compliant smart contract development makes it easier for engineers with skills in traditional programming languages such as C++ and Rust to enter the Web3 world as well.

dApp Staking is designed to distribute $ASTR based on the developer's contribution to the ecosystem. It will be updated to version 3 specifications soon.

Where does the AstarNetwork get its support?

In addition to numerous VC firms, he has received investments from web3 advocate and Ethereum and Polkadot co-founder Gavin Wood and Jutta Steiner, former CEO of Parity and Ethereum's former Chief Security Officer.

About Astar Japan Lab

A consortium established to facilitate the creation of use cases on Astar and collaboration with web3 startups.

Dentsu, Hakuhodo, Microsoft, Amazon, MUFG, SoftBank, SMBC, Accenture, Mori Building, Fujitsu, Secom Trust Systems, and others are participating in the project and exploring business co-creation.

Startale Labs Japan

  • Product Development

Multi-chain wallet development. Suppress web3 gateway for Japanese users. Ideally, work with existing partners such as DOCOMO, etc., and aim to have the application installed on cell phones by default.

  • R&D / Consulting

Based on the experience of developing and operating the only public Layer 1 chain in Japan, the company supports companies that want to create Layer 1, implements peripheral technologies, and develops businesses.

  • Provide solution packages with existing partners

A web3 version of RedHat's business model, offering packaged solutions such as Fireblocks, Circle, BitGo and other corporate custody solutions, as well as Astar-based metaverse and NFT solutions, for business to business.

title: Shiden Learning Course
intro: This course is designed to learn about Shiden Network.
content:
About Shiden Network

Shiden Network is a smart contract platform project on Kusama that serves as an R&D chain for Astar Network.

About Kusama

Kusama is Polkadot's R&D chain. In other words, it is a proprietary blockchain for Polkadot's R&D purposes.

Shiden Network is a para-chain that connects to this Kusama.

Shiden Network Features

Shiden Network natively supports multiple Layer 2 solutions from the start, enabling a variety of applications such as Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), WebAssembly, and DeFi and NFT.

Programming languages for development

  • 1.!ink
  • 2.!ask

Development Frameworks
